## 

[Reference](https://note.com/maxwell/n/nc78c55afe944?magazine_key=mc84c90fb0e35)

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(MASS)
library(survival)
```



```{r}
data(gehan)
gehan
```

```{r}
cut.points <- gehan %>% 
  filter(cens == 1) %>% 
  arrange(time) %>% 
  pull(time) %>% 
  unique()

cut.points
```



```{r}
gehan2 <- survival::survSplit(data = gehan, 
                              cut = cut.points,
                              start = "start",
                              end = "time",
                              event = "cens")
colnames(gehan2)[4] <- "stop"
gehan2
```
